data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Bình Định, Vietnam a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bình Định, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Bình Định to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 46 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Bình Định, Vietnam from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bình Định, Vietnam.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Haroi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, grace the churches in Bình Định, Vietnam with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Bình Định, Vietnam to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the state of Bình Định, Vietnam has a population of 1,545,300.

We estimate Bình Định has 33,423 people who might know Jesus, 123,952 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,387,924 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Bình Định. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
